code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import NewUserForm from'../components/NewUserForm';import ClaimPoints from'../components/ClaimPoints';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[leaderboard,setLeaderboard]=useState([]);const[pointsAwarded,setPointsAwarded]=useState(null);const fetchUsers=async()=>{const res=await axios.get('https://leaderboard-9e3h.onrender.com/api/users');setUsers(res.data);};const fetchLeaderboard=async()=>{const res=await axios.get('https://leaderboard-9e3h.onrender.com/api/users/leaderboard');setLeaderboard(res.data);};useEffect(()=>{fetchUsers();fetchLeaderboard();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83C\uDFC6 Add User & Claim Points"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewUserForm,{onUpload:fetchUsers,refreshLeaderboard:fetchLeaderboard}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClaimPoints,{users:users,onClaim:fetchUsers,refreshLeaderboard:fetchLeaderboard,pointsAwarded:pointsAwarded,setPointsAwarded:setPointsAwarded})]});}export default Home;
